clothing_items.Title: Blue Striped Shirt
clothing_items.Description: Blue shirt with white stripes
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Blue shirt with horizontal white stripes. Slim fit design with a button-down collar. Ideal for casual or semi-formal occasions.

clothing_items.Title: Black Skinny Jeans
clothing_items.Description: Black skinny jeans for men
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Men's black skinny jeans with a stretchable fabric. Classic 5-pocket design with a zip fly and button closure. Perfect for a stylish and comfortable look.

clothing_items.Title: Flowy Floral Dress
clothing_items.Description: Flowy floral dress with a v-neckline
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Elegant floral dress with a flowy silhouette and a v-neckline. The dress features a floral print with pastel colors, perfect for spring and summer occasions.

clothing_items.Title: Khaki Trench Coat
clothing_items.Description: Classic khaki trench coat for women
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Women's classic khaki trench coat with a double-breasted front and a waist belt. The coat has shoulder epaulets and buttoned side pockets.

clothing_items.Title: Leather Crossbody Bag
clothing_items.Description: Black leather crossbody bag
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Black leather crossbody bag with gold-tone hardware. The bag has a front zip pocket and an adjustable shoulder strap for easy wear.

clothing_items.Title: Striped Sweater
clothing_items.Description: Striped sweater in neutral tones
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Neutral-toned sweater with horizontal stripes in beige, grey, and white. The sweater has a crew neckline and ribbed cuffs and hem.

clothing_items.Title: Denim Shorts
clothing_items.Description: Light wash denim shorts for women
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Women's light wash denim shorts with distressed detailing. The shorts have a high-rise waist and frayed hem. Perfect for a summery casual look.

clothing_items.Title: Floral Print Maxi Dress
clothing_items.Description: Bohemian-style maxi dress with floral print
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Bohemian-style maxi dress with a flowy silhouette and a vibrant floral print. The dress features a plunging neckline and adjustable tie straps.

clothing_items.Title: Puffer Jacket
clothing_items.Description: Black puffer jacket for men
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Men's black puffer jacket with a quilted design and a zip front closure. The jacket has a high neck and side zip pockets for added functionality.

clothing_items.Title: Wool Fedora Hat
clothing_items.Description: Classic wool fedora hat in black
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Classic black wool fedora hat with a structured crown and a wide brim. The hat is embellished with a ribbon band for a sophisticated touch.

clothing_items.Title: Plaid Flannel Shirt
clothing_items.Description: Plaid flannel shirt in red and black
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Classic red and black plaid flannel shirt with a soft and cozy fabric. The shirt has a button-up design and chest pockets, perfect for a casual and warm look.

clothing_items.Title: Cargo Pants
clothing_items.Description: Cargo pants with multiple pockets
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Men's cargo pants in olive green with multiple pockets for functionality. The pants have a relaxed fit and adjustable drawstring hems for a versatile look.

clothing_items.Title: Lace Trim Slip Dress
clothing_items.Description: Satin slip dress with lace trim
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Satin slip dress in champagne color with delicate lace trim detailing. The dress features adjustable spaghetti straps and a flattering bias cut.

clothing_items.Title: Faux Fur Coat
clothing_items.Description: Soft faux fur coat in cream
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Women's faux fur coat in a luxurious cream color. The coat has a plush texture and a relaxed fit, perfect for adding glamour and warmth to any outfit.

clothing_items.Title: Quilted Crossbody Bag
clothing_items.Description: Quilted black crossbody bag
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Black quilted crossbody bag with a chain strap and gold-tone hardware. The bag features a fold-over flap with a twist-lock closure for a chic and sophisticated look.

clothing_items.Title: Striped Crop Top
clothing_items.Description: Striped crop top in pastel colors
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Pastel-colored crop top with vertical stripes in soft pink, blue, and yellow. The top has a square neckline and short puff sleeves for a trendy and feminine style.

clothing_items.Title: Denim Skirt
clothing_items.Description: High-waisted denim skirt
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Women's high-waisted denim skirt in medium wash. The skirt features a button-up front and front patch pockets, giving it a retro and casual vibe.

clothing_items.Title: Off-Shoulder Jumpsuit
clothing_items.Description: Off-shoulder jumpsuit in navy blue
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Navy blue off-shoulder jumpsuit with a ruffled neckline and tie belt at the waist. The jumpsuit features wide legs and is perfect for a dressed-up casual look.

clothing_items.Title: Faux Leather Moto Jacket
clothing_items.Description: Black faux leather moto jacket
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Edgy black faux leather moto jacket with silver-tone hardware and zip details. The jacket features a notched lapel and belted waist for a modern and cool style.

clothing_items.Title: Wide Brim Straw Hat
clothing_items.Description: Wide brim straw hat with black ribbon
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Natural straw hat with a wide brim and a classic black ribbon band. The hat is perfect for sunny days and beach outings, providing both style and sun protection.

clothing_items.Title: Cable Knit Sweater
clothing_items.Description: Chunky cable knit sweater in ivory
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Chunky cable knit sweater in ivory with a cozy and textured design. The sweater features a ribbed crew neckline and sleeves, perfect for staying warm and stylish.

clothing_items.Title: Camo Cargo Pants
clothing_items.Description: Camo print cargo pants for men
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Men's camo print cargo pants with a relaxed fit and multiple pockets for utility. The pants feature a drawstring waist and elasticized cuffs for a modern look.

clothing_items.Title: Ruffled Wrap Dress
clothing_items.Description: Floral wrap dress with ruffled details
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Floral wrap dress with a deep V-neckline and ruffled trim. The dress has a tie waist and flowy sleeves, creating a romantic and feminine silhouette.

clothing_items.Title: Fleece-Lined Parka
clothing_items.Description: Fleece-lined parka in olive green
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Women's olive green parka with a cozy fleece lining and a faux fur-trimmed hood. The parka has multiple pockets and a drawstring waist for a flattering fit.

clothing_items.Title: Mini Backpack
clothing_items.Description: Mini backpack in blush pink
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Blush pink mini backpack with gold-tone hardware and adjustable shoulder straps. The backpack features a front zip pocket and a top zip closure.

clothing_items.Title: V-Neck Knit Sweater
clothing_items.Description: V-neck knit sweater in camel
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Camel-colored knit sweater with a V-neckline and ribbed trims. The sweater has a relaxed fit and is perfect for layering over shirts or tees.

clothing_items.Title: Pleated Midi Skirt
clothing_items.Description: Pleated midi skirt in metallic silver
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Shimmering metallic silver midi skirt with accordion pleats and an elastic waistband. The skirt has a flowy silhouette and is ideal for dressing up or down.

clothing_items.Title: Floral Wrap Maxi Dress
clothing_items.Description: Boho-inspired wrap maxi dress
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Bohemian-inspired maxi dress with a wrap design and floral print. The dress features flutter sleeves and a tie waist, perfect for a boho-chic look.

clothing_items.Title: Hooded Fleece Jacket
clothing_items.Description: Hooded fleece jacket in navy
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Navy hooded fleece jacket with a zip front closure and side zip pockets. The jacket has a contrast drawstring hood and a casual sporty vibe.

clothing_items.Title: Bucket Hat
clothing_items.Description: Trendy bucket hat in khaki
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Khaki bucket hat with a wide brim and a relaxed fit. The hat is made of soft cotton and is perfect for adding a cool and casual touch to any outfit.

clothing_items.Title: Ruffled Blouse
clothing_items.Description: Ruffled blouse in polka dot print
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Polka dot print blouse with ruffled neckline and sleeves. The blouse has a button-up front and a tie waist detail, creating a polished and feminine look.

clothing_items.Title: Pleated Culottes
clothing_items.Description: Pleated culottes in navy blue
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Navy blue pleated culottes with a high-rise waist and wide legs. The culottes have a concealed side zip closure and are perfect for a modern and sophisticated style.

clothing_items.Title: Floral Print Ruffle Dress
clothing_items.Description: Floral print dress with ruffle trim
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Floral print dress with a wrap silhouette and cascading ruffle trim. The dress features a V-neckline and tie waist detail, perfect for a feminine and romantic look.

clothing_items.Title: Belted Trench Coat
clothing_items.Description: Classic belted trench coat in camel
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Classic belted trench coat in camel color with a double-breasted front and storm flap details. The coat has a removable belt and is a timeless outerwear piece.

clothing_items.Title: Beaded Drop Earrings
clothing_items.Description: Statement beaded earrings in teal
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Teal beaded drop earrings with a gold-tone stud and intricate beadwork. The earrings are lightweight and perfect for adding a pop of color to any outfit.

clothing_items.Title: Striped Button-Up Shirt
clothing_items.Description: Striped button-up shirt in blue and white
clothing_items.Detailed Description: Blue and white striped button-up shirt with a relaxed fit and cuffed sleeves. The shirt has a front patch pocket and a curved hem, perfect for a casual and polished look.
